description:
Bristech & MLOps collab #74! On August 4, we will be talking to Alon Gubkin, VP R&D of Aporia, about Building an ML Platform from Scratch: Live Coding Session - Part 2!

// Register at:
https://go.mlops.community/register

// Abstract:
In our previous live coding session, we built an ML platform using MLFlow, DVC, Pulumi, and other tools.

As requested by the community, during the second session we'll focus on how to add solutions for Model Monitoring and Training Orchestration.

All codes will be available on GitHub after the workshop!

// Bio:
Alon Gubkin is the VP R&D at Aporia. Writing code from the age of 7, Alon has an unhealthy obsession with programming and a huge love for mixing engineering with data science. When he isn't coding, Alon enjoys playing video games and musing about biology.

// Final thoughts
Please feel free to drop some questions you may have beforehand into our slack channel (https://go.mlops.community/slack)
Watch some old meetups on our youtube channel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCG6qpjVnBTTT8wLGBygANOQ
title: Building an ML Platform from Scratch: Live Coding Session - Part 2
